name: zinc
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Special Defense effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.black-white: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Def (Special Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base Sp. Def (Special Defense) stat of a single Pokémon.
